titles.title: End Taxpayer Promotion of Alcohol Overseas Act
To amend the Agricultural Trade Act of 1978 to eliminate current Federal subsidies for alcoholic beverage promotions overseas.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Agriculture.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Department Operations, Nutrition and Foreign Agriculture.

committee.subcommittee: Department Operations, Nutrition and Foreign Agriculture
committee.name: House Agriculture

bill.summary: 5/16/1996--Introduced. End Taxpayer Promotion of Alcohol Overseas Act - Amends the Agricultural Trade Act of 1978 to prohibit the use of funds for overseas promotion of alcoholic beverages.
